title: Food for thought
creator_credit: UNICEF, Indian Film Unit, K Khandpur and T.A. Abraham
brief_description: This prize-winning film illustrates the problems of the rural community of Orissa as it strives to combat hunger and malnutrition by use of improved methods of poultry and fish farming, cultivation of school gardens and nutrition education.
creator_credit_for_label: UNICEF, Indian Film Unit, K Khandpur and T.A. Abraham
